address_tag.description: address tag for from, to and cc headers (empty for disabling address tagging)

internal_list.description: name of address list with internal domains which are excluded from address tagging of to/cc headers (empty for disabling to/cc header address tagging)

subject_tag.description: tag for subject header (empty for disabling subject tagging)

text_tag.description: name of annotation for tagging text body (empty for disabling text body tagging)

text_top.description: insert text tag at top else at the bottom

html_tag.description: name of annotation for tagging html body (empty for disabling html body tagging)

html_top.description: insert html tag at top else at the bottom

calendar_tag.description: calendar tag for organizer field (empty for disabling calendar tagging)
